mapper.select: select * from groupcode order by gcode
mapper.insert: insert into product(code, pname, cost, pnum, jnum, sale, gcode) values(#{code},#{pname},#{cost},#{pnum},#{jnum},#{sale},#{gcode})
mapper.select: select pname str, cost * jnum no from product order by no desc
select pname str, pnum - jnum no from product where jnum < pnum * 0.2
select gname str, sum(jnum) as no from product join groupcode using (gcode) group by gname
